entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and early afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
